website_summaries.verdict: An ideal girls' swimsuit for those looking for a sportier or more modest look.
pros: Comfortable two-piece with a tank top and boy shorts that is available in seven different colors
Made of quality material that holds up
cons: Some buyers report that these tankinis run a little big

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and sporty suit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 5ft tall and 85 lbs, and the size 12-13/4XL fit her perfectly. Well made. Has thin removable pads for extra coverage, the top covers her belly, and there are no "cheeks" peeking from the shorts! Modest, but cute and sporty.
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: Cute modest swimsuits for girls. Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these swimsuits. One for my niece and one for my daughter. They are lovely! They are cute and modest exactly how I want my ladies to look. They are very good quality and a reasonable price. The sizing when purchasing was a little confusing. I purchased the 2xl for my niece who wears an 8. She is very thin and wiry, they fit perfect. I purchased the 4xl for my daughter who is thicker and wears a 10-12. I wish I had gotten the shorts one size bigger, but overall they will do. I will likely purchase again next year for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mystique

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Loved how this 2 piece fit my girls. You wont regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. F

customer_reviews.title: Great suit at very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This suit is really nice for the price. I ordered it in two sizes since reviews were mixed on fit. My girl wears a size 12 slim (she is very slender) and the 12/13 (4xl) size fits perfectly. People should be aware there's a little bra thing in there...that's fine for tweens but would be weird for younger kids. My daughter loves it, and I love that she gets more coverage than most size 12 suits!
customer_reviews.author: Bonny Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great kids bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: This fit my 10 year old perfect with great coverage. I hate all these slinky bathing suits they have for little girls. Awful. She loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Cute but BIG
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and quality swimsuit. However the fit is EXTREMELY large. I bought another swimsuit of a different brand at the same time as this one. The other one fit perfectly but this one will probably not fit her for 2-3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya G

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I received the suit on June 15 . Last week I had a few threads loose on the seams of the boy shorts. Sadly the shorts are unraveling. I am a great grandma. My granddaughter loves them and I should have sent them back. Instead I sent the suit off to camp with her. I am too tired to go thru the procedure of sending. I just hope the suit lasts a month.
customer_reviews.author: LKC

customer_reviews.title: not for skinny kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 6, about 45# about 47" tall, ordered 3-4T/Tag Size M, Blue. The length is perfect. The suit is way too wide for her, too baggy around the legs for decency, and top is too loose. It is a beautiful color and well made, just not for skinny kids! I doubt she will widen enough to grow into this unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa E

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and perfect for my girl
customer_reviews.text: After searching in the reviews, I decided the 5-6 would best fit my 6-year-old. She is 50 pounds and 46 inches tall. I needed something that would give her modest coverage and something that wouldn't be too thin. The material is great quality and a bit thicker than some of the cheap stuff you can find on Amazon, which was exactly what I was looking for. I am very happy with this purchase and I am about to buy another one for her younger sister.
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color lasted one day (SEE UPDATE - Seller offered a replacement!)
customer_reviews.text: We received these on a Thursday. On Monday they were worn while snorkeling in the Dominican Republic (note how vibrant it looks!) By Tuesday morning, they were horribly faded on the bottom portion of the top (see the after picture!) This "new" swimsuit looked two years old! Very disappointed!!! UPDATE: The seller offered to replace the item. Five stars for service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Barringer

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice quality swimsuit. My daughter is at the preteen stage where her body is changing but not fully changed (still has a little baby fat in the middle section) so I was a bit imitated by swimsuit buying this summer. I actually bought this swimsuit with the intention of using it as a reference or a starting point. It fit true to size and the quality is great. I ended up using it as her main swimsuit and am purchasing another in a different color. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Modest swim suit for a little one
customer_reviews.text: This was the second swim suit that I ordered for my little girl, in this same style. I wanted a swim suit that would be appropriate for a little one in any setting (daycare, the beach, at a family event). I like that the boy shorts provide enough coverage that she doesn't need to wear anything over the swim suit. It's like she's in a short & top set. It's very comfortable for her. I ordered one size up because I wanted her to have room for the swim diaper.
customer_reviews.author: B J

customer_reviews.title: Loves this swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves swimming but is modest. She loves the cut of this suit; two-piece but doesn't show her tummy and is comfortable for real swimming; not just hanging out at the pool. Great suit.
customer_reviews.author: historyteacher

customer_reviews.title: Love this and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old. I got the 6-7 fit. The bottoms fit perfectly, the top was a tad big on her but shes bigger on the bottom. I really love this bathing suit. i got the one with the watermelon color on it. The quality of the material is good. I will buy from this company again. Plus i received it earlier then expected. Order - You wouldnt be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: deedee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this swimsuit. She doesn’t want to go back to wearing a one piece anymore. She says it’s comfortable and cute. It does run a little small and the padding for the chest doesn’t stay very well...we ended up throwing it out because she doesn’t really have anything in the chest area yet but if your daughter does I’d recommend getting a swimsuit with better coverage and support in the chest area but if you don’t have an early bloomer then this swimsuit set is great.
customer_reviews.author: CHEezyMom

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, but hard to fit.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandniece is 38” tall and 33 pounds, wears a 3t. I ordered the M (3-4) and I had the opposite problem as other reviewers, the top fit perfectly but the bottoms are slightly big. Enough that I worry they will fall off when they are wet. If your little one is still in diapers it would be fine. Otherwise it’s a well made suit and great price.
customer_reviews.author: CAMC

customer_reviews.title: Nice 2 piece bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these bathing suits for my 7 and 9 and a 1/2 year old granddaughters when staying with me this summer. They love them. The tops were a little on the large size but still very wearable. Although the lining on the larger size kept floating up in the pool it was easy to tack down with a couple of stitches. I would definitely recommend these as they also come in an assortment of colors that the girls would really appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color fades quickly
customer_reviews.text: I loved that this suit crisscrossed across my little girl's back and was very modest. She picked the yellow banana one. It does say hand wash only and I did stick with that the first couple times washing it but it started fading quickly anyways. The yellow mostly has gone to a much lighter yellow except for the yellow around the neck which stayed the same. In this way it was obvious that it faded. It has been washed 3 times and is very faded already like she wore it all summer. It was a great cut and color, just wish it held up longer.
customer_reviews.author: star_cascade

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the beach and it works perfectly. It stays put during boogie boarding, crashing in waves, digging in sand and anything else kids do. I like that it covers a lot and she never has to adjust it. She loves the shorts and says it’s very comfortable. She is 9 years old, 4’6” weighs 63 lbs. She usually wears a medium, I bought a small based on reviews and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: melaniedawn7

customer_reviews.title: runs very small
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears a 14/16 and based off other reviews I purchased the 4xl. It's too small. Fits like a 10/12. I am returning and there was another company with the same suit I'm going to get in a 5xl and see how that goes. BUT, the suit is just as described and cute, and it does have the chest removable pads.
customer_reviews.author: Mikisa

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit...top runs big
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a reasonably priced suit for playing at the water table, with easy-off bottoms for potty breaks. This fits the bill perfectly and she loves her "banana shorts". She wears 6/6x shorts and the 6-7 size fit great on her bottom, but the top is a little big. The top is too loose for swimming, but we're using it for water table, sprinkler etc. at our home, so it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: I was so pleased with the quality of this suit I ordered another
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this swimsuit for my granddaughter who swims everyday, often several times a day. I was so pleased with the quality of this suit I ordered another! Great suit, fits perfectly, color is nice, and my granddaughter tells me it's her favorite because it's so comfortable. It doesn't ride up and that's an important quality!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes this suit! I went with this style because the bottoms fit much better than a normal tankini. We got a similar one from a different brand and this one was definitely better quality. We did cut out the lining on the front because there is only a flap on lining that kept peaking out the bottom. Other bottoms like this are lined through the whole front. But it works without it. Very happy with this suit.
customer_reviews.author: ATS

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit! Great Durability! Great Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 10 yr old daughter and she is very above average height. Fit Perfectly!!! The shorts (which u cant find in stores anymore) r actual shorts and covered her butt awesomely, also they didnt ride up on her going down water slides at a park. The top fit her great as well, it does cover her whole belly, it's not a belly showing top at all, which she likes. So overall EXTREMELY satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Korey Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter is a bit on the plus size so she normally wears a 14. I ordered the 5xl which is (14-15) and it fit her perfectly . The top was a good length and the pants fit snug. If you prefer a looser fit go a size up. The top came with removable bra inserts and the pants don’t have the underwear inside .
customer_reviews.author: Talieeya

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This set looks and fits great on my daughter-- it definitely runs small, though. She's a chunky 8.5-year-old and I ordered size 5XL. It fits comfortably-- like a fitted tank top, rather than a tight-fitting swimsuit, so keep that in mind for ordering. That being said, I'm ordering another one in another colorway since she likes it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya T Stankunas

customer_reviews.title: i liked it, grandgirl finally does
customer_reviews.text: this med fit my 9yr grdgrl but was too revealing for her tastes as she’s a tomboy and likes to wear tshirts and trunks. so i’ll save it for her next yr and hope she’ll like it then. she’s now 10-1/2 and finally wears it after sitting in her dresser.. now it’s a bit tight and she doesn’t like how it itches at the seams..but otherwise she does wear it. just got an xl one so hope it works for her...the xl one fits in the shorts but not the top so took it in 2-1/2” on the sides and it’s ok.. she 27” in chest and 28 hips
customer_reviews.author: nanamamaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: This 2pc suit is perfect for girls running a wee bit  bigger in their bottoms than their topss
customer_reviews.text: This summer I bought this exact suit in one size smaller for our 10yr old granddaughter, who weighs about 75lbs and is short for her age. She has a round little tushy, and otherwise was fitting into sz10 dresses... But sz12's we're usually needed for jeans, but they'd always be too long (just to give u an idea of her frame. The sz smaller than the one I just ordered fit her PERfectly, and covered her bottom to boot. The blue color had her blue eyes pop!. She even loved the color, when her usual girly girl color preference is pink. Sooo, I bought this bigger size for next summer for her.
customer_reviews.author: p. whitson

customer_reviews.title: No built in underwear.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this suit. It’s well made with one exception. There is no built in panty and the shorts are not snug around the legs. So not only does sand get all over, when my daughter sits you can totally see everything. We have remedied this by using an two piece bottom, but it defeats the purpose of all in one swim shorts.
customer_reviews.author: MEG G

customer_reviews.title: Weird sizing and fit
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews and size chart I bought an "xl" for my 6 year old who is 46inches and 46 ish pounds. The bottoms fit perfectly but top is too big. I tried to shrink it but it didn't work. When she wore it in the pool it sagged down very low...
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this bathing suit , I have been getting it for the past 3 yrs for my granddaughter as the top or bottoms do not ride up and she does not complain of it not being comfortable - she is very picky - others have now purchased it too as they like what they see, the modesty, cuteness and comfort! Wish they would have more available in other sizes
customer_reviews.author: Person in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer suit!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest swimsuit ever! I’ll be honest, I was a bit worried about her choice of the yellow bananas, but I’m so glad I got it for her. My daughter is 8 yrs old, tall and slender. The size 8/9 fit her perfectly. Modest enough for a christian day care, and fun enough for the beach. And a bonus, the bright yellow makes her easy to spot!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This looks so cute on my daughter. She’s an average size nine-year-old and it fits great. It’s not too tight or too loose, but she would be able to wear it for at least a year. She loves it. It’s comfortable and flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors, great fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a bright, pretty bathing suit. It looks really cute on my daughter. Our only issue is that part of the liner that looks like white pockets in the bottoms hang out of the bottom of the suit. We are going to cut them out and it should be fine. She has swam in it about 5 times and it is still bright and pretty. The fit was also just right.
customer_reviews.author: kchae7

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this swimsuit on my daughter. It is the most appropriate swim suit with regard to coverage and protection. She could swim, or hang outside with her family all day. I did caught the obnoxious bow off the front. Very easy to do with a seam ripper. I’m going to buy the next size up. This week.
customer_reviews.author: HONEST BUYER

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I saw it when my daughter was growing up and it appears to be worse now while shopping for my grand daughter; designers making outfits that are too 'sexy' for little girls. This swimsuit was exactly what I was looking for and has a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Moe214

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 14-15 for my daughter. She is growing out of size 16 and this swim suit worked perfect for her. She is a little thicker with bigger hips. (Like her Mama) I was pleased with how well the top and bottom fit. She doesn't like her belly hanging out and it does cover her nicely which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Perez

customer_reviews.title: VERY well made, cute style!
customer_reviews.text: Got this suit for our 6-yr-old granddaughter. She loves it! Sporty style and so well made: the front of the suit and a large area of the north are lined for modesty--a great feature. Nice thick material and easy to put on/take off even when wet. Excellent value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Word Maven

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this suit so much she wore it around the house all day. She’s 10, 4’11” and a slim 70 lbs; shorts fit her perfectly, top is a little loose but she feels covered in it. Great for a kid who likes to be covered (mine like to be pretty modest around her friends) and have the convenience of a 2 piece. Knocked down a star for the loose fitting tank and “bow” on shorts that really just hangs down as strings- probably will never get or stay tied- but the kid is happy and so am I
customer_reviews.author: J. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Cute and modest
customer_reviews.text: Love that my 10 year old can wear something comfortable and cute without it being too skimpy. She just turned 10 and it fits perfectly; I hope it lasts through the summer. She normally wears a 10-12, but I was concerned the 12-13 would be too big. You don't want a loose bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: unflattering!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute swimsuit for a 5 year old but the cut of it is too small and not flattering. The description doesn't match the actual over all look.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jones

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a darling suit. My daughter is 8 but still wears a 6. I ordered a 7 and it fit her perfectly so I feel like to run a bit small. I would order this again for sure. It even comes with a little water proof bag to put the suit in when it is wet. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: QltrGrl

customer_reviews.title: Cute design, but the shorts ride up
customer_reviews.text: The top fits perfectly and is very cute. The shorts are a little too tight and short. My daughter wanted to have something a little more modest, but the way the shorts ride up make them not any better than a regular one-piece. I also think the shorts could be slightly looser. The white lining shows whenever the shorts ride up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but and fits well but after just one wear the shorts look all frayed and fuzzy.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute swimsuit. My daughter is very shy about swim suits and felt comfortable in this swim suit. She is only 10 and starts a size 14-16 in children's place, the largest size tan a little snug on her. I washed it before she wore it and the pink bled into the test of the suit.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Wedgie but Daughter Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 9 and I bought the size 14/15 (She normally wears size 12). This suit is SUPER snug. My biggest complaint is that the size is not accurate. It is so snug she is constantly pulling it down because of the wedgie in front and in back.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Bottom fit perfect. Color was different then appeared in picture
customer_reviews.text: Top too large. Bottom fit perfect. Color was different then appeared in picture. Ordered the rose one (looks pink and black with white stripe) but it’s actually a dark blue and stripe is a aqua blue (see pic). Still looks nice but have to get a smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Violet Everidge

customer_reviews.title: Shorts are great, top is crazy huge
customer_reviews.text: Shorts are perfect fit and of good quality. The top is enormous and does not fit at all. When it gets wet in the pool, it's even larger. It seems like they are 2 completely different sizes.The fabric is good quality. They are nice colors. They just don't fit as a set.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice suit. Soft bathing suit material stretches nicely. My daughter loves it. I just should have purchased a size up. My daughter is 13 and a half and the suit was a little tight on her. Yet, the price is affordable so it won’t hurt to buy it again in a larger size. It is lined in all the right places and it also came with removable breast pads.
customer_reviews.author: Mazora

customer_reviews.title: Nice Swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact that it runs a little bit small in sizing, very nice swim suit. Well made, and provides nice coverage. Vibrant colors, and good quality. Purchased for a larger 6 year old, who is fairly thick around and weighs about 60 pounds. Washed well, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Rigdon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sporty but girly swim suit.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesn't like traditional girl swim suits because "they look like underware". This is the compromise I found and we both love it. A touch more coverage, she's not adjusting it all the time and cute as a button on her. I even bought a second we both liked it so much. Plan on washing it immediately as there is quite the plastic smell from the bag it's packaged in. It mostly seemed to go away with a quick wash.
customer_reviews.author: JWeil

customer_reviews.title: This is a great swim suit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great swim suit. My daughter wanted shorts and needed a long top to cover her belly since she has a long torso. Even all day at the water park and the suit stays were it should. She is happy and comfortable and modest.
customer_reviews.author: Shorty

customer_reviews.title: I love that the tankini was long enough to keep her ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that the tankini was long enough to keep her stomach covered. It is so hard to find one that does that. It had chest pads that I took out because my daughter didn't need them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: What's there not to love about this tankini swimsuit?!! Got this for my six year old and it not only fits her perfectly (6/6X), but it also looks amazing and is extremely comfy. My daughter loves it and so do I!! Can't wait to go jet skiing...
customer_reviews.author: C&K

customer_reviews.title: Best kids swimsuit online!
customer_reviews.text: Love this swim set! I Have ordered several swimsuits for my daughter as we cant find good quality ones that fit. She usually wears the Walmart brand wonder nation in a size 14/16, this is slightly longer in the torso with a bit more wiggle room. The shorts fit with a bit more wiggle room as well. The best thing about these are they are not see through like so many I've ordered online. Overall a great purchase,
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this swimsuit for my daughter and it fit nicely. She wore it only twice and the second time after we washed it the band in the swim suit got completely twisted and became unwearable. I was going to buy another one even though I was pretty upset by this but for some reason even though it says free shipping and I have prime once I went to place the order they added on $9 in shipping. For a swimsuit that shouldn't even be replaced. Super ridiculous. So I would recommend not buying.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Order a size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I knew I was taking a risk. But we needed a suit for swimming lessons and they don't sell them locally this time of year. Wosh we had ordered a size bigger. It might make it through the 2 months of lessons, hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: TheGlenFam2010

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish for a little girl
customer_reviews.text: I really love this suit for my 6 year old. She is slightly tall, 50 lbs, the large fit her perfectly. She loves how 'big girl' it looks. I love how she looks cute And Age Appropriate. Very hard to find nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: Debra McCra

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble finding a swim suit for my daughter that had shorts for bottoms. When we're at our rec center, she wears a life jacket and the strap that goes between her legs tends to rub and makes her inner thighs sore. These really help with that and she says it's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Colors bleed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two suits for my petite girls, size 5/6, the bright pink and lavender. The neck is very stretchy and low. The shorts fit great for them but my biggest issue is the colors BLEED and have ruined other’s things that have been washed with them.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: Great suit! Fits my kiddo well. She's been wearing size 8 in most of her clothes. This 8-9 is a just a little big (which is ideal because I think she can wear it next summer too). Bright colors, washes well - no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit. My kids burn easily and this suit covers more than most. The top fits like a typical tank top and the shorts are a bit longer so the bottom doesn't hang out. I had several complements on this suits and inquiries as to where we got it. I wish I could find something like this in my size. Thanks for such a great priduct.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Crowther

customer_reviews.title: Cute but ran a bit small
customer_reviews.text: The colors were true and a very cute cut. The top fit as expected, but the bottoms were smaller than expected. Given the description kept saying these ran a little large, that was disappointing, and we had to return it. Also, it came in a plastic zipped pouch, which is a minus for us--just another piece of plastic we don't need.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Well made bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these bathing suits as a gift. They arrived after the party. I didn't realize they were coming from China. The suits were actually very well made and ran a little large. No problem they will grow to fit them by summer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a USED outfit, compares to the others I've ordered.
customer_reviews.text: It's a used product. Should have given as a discount. DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Lagilelei Andrews

customer_reviews.title: So darn cute
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved the fit. The color is vibrant and the fit is perfect. Very comfortable for her. She's taller than an average 4 yr old. So there are times fitting her is tough. Not this time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6/7 tag, size XL fits my slim 7 year old: 4/15 tag, size 5X is a little snug on my thick 13 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loves it. My 13 year old does fit into hers, though it is just a little snug - in all fairness, she would fit better into a true junior size. Quality is great. Looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Nici

customer_reviews.title: Good for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to find 2 piece swimwear that fits my daughter properly. This did the trick. Very comfortable and age appropriate to cover a little more than most of what they have out for girls. Modesty is key
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Very cute swim suit
customer_reviews.text: My 12 y/o daughter loves this bathing suit! It fits very well and looks very cute on her. My daughter is not a girly girl and does not like most bathing suits - she started wanting to wear shorts and shirts over her bathing suit. This suit is perfect for her and she loves it. She is a tall, thin almost 13 y/o and I ordered the 14-15 which fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute & modest Swimwear for Pre-teen Girl
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color, the boy shorts and the fact that there are thin removal pads in top. This is a cute & modest suit, and perfect for my 12 year old daughter. The only problem was the top was too big in the chest area, and you could see her chest at underarm. I ended up sewing in the side seems, to make it fit more snug.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly anderson

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed to find that the size 6 came with chest ...
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed to find that the size 6 came with chest padding. Not what I wanted for my kindergartener. Also just too big so I ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Great suit.
customer_reviews.text: For developing tween girls, there are pad inserts (that can be removed if wanted) to further line the chest area. I think this is personally a positive option to have to give extra modesty to the bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Flores

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice material for the price, this runs big. Get a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit. Great color, very modest for a suit and the fit was spot on. I looked at the reviews for sizing because my daughter is super tall and very slender. She’s 11. The 10/12 was a great fit. Very happy with my first online bathing suit order.
customer_reviews.author: Chris zipter

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this because it fit well. I went up one size with no problem. It was a Lilly’s big but not so much that it couldn’t be worn, in fact, she seemed more comfortable. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M

customer_reviews.title: Top too big
customer_reviews.text: Nice material and sewn well. However it is not proportioned properly. Top is way way too big. Bottoms fit perfect. By the time my kid grows into the top the bottoms will be too small.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pre-Teens
customer_reviews.text: Fits my daughter perfectly I just need to sew the breast shields into the suit they are not secured to the suit in anyway and fall out. Other than a few sewing stitches my daughter loves this swim suit.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rickert

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, But too small (10 year old)
customer_reviews.text: Got this swim dress for my 10-year-old daughter. The package is good and received quickly. But the shot is too small for a 10-year-old girl. So end up returning it to Amazon. Got another (red) one for my 6-year-old and it did fit well.
customer_reviews.author: NilatS

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and vivid colors!
customer_reviews.text: The padding in the top is not bulky nor moves around too much. My daughter has some mobility and small motor challenges, and found this fairly easy to put on and take off. It doesn’t roll up or scrunch up while she’s swimming, getting in or out of the pool or getting on and off her wheelchair.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to learn to swim was not sure if was gonna fit but it does! She says it’s not bothering her in the water. It drys quickly! This is a product I would recommend if your trying to find a two piece boy short tankini!
customer_reviews.author: Animal lovers

customer_reviews.title: I like the boy-short style better than bikini-style
customer_reviews.text: Cute little bathing suits for my granddaughters. I like the boy-short style better than bikini-style. They are pretty average on size, but these seemed a little large in the armhole. I just took a stitch on both straps and shortened it a bit. I’m thinking that next year I can just undo the stitching and get another year of use out of them!
customer_reviews.author: cyn ann

customer_reviews.title: The Bright Color Bleeds
customer_reviews.text: We have to return this product because the pink color bleeds and completely discolored the rest of our laundry when washed for the first time in our washer. Not what we expected. Also the top is quite loose for a skinny girl.
customer_reviews.author: L2

customer_reviews.title: Color bleeds
customer_reviews.text: No matter how I wash this swimsuit, the color bleeds horribly even after more than 20 washes. It works well while swimming and fits well, but if it gets left in the clothes hamper while damp, all the clothes it touches are stained and you can't get the color out.
customer_reviews.author: Darling

customer_reviews.title: Bleeding issue with this suit.
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is very cute, but even washing it in cold water the pink bled. And after several washes the pink is bleeding on my daughter's skin. It washes right off when she showers but this shouldn't happen. The thread is also coming out of the shorts. Very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mam

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors, well-made, perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, well made, good value! My 9-year old LOVES her new swimsuit! Colors are bright and, so far, no fading from the sun/chlorine. I was concerned about the shorts riding up, but this has not been an issue. Fits perfectly! Would purchase, again!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bothell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect compromise between a tomboy daughter and a pageant mom. It fits her a little loose, but she is tall and thin. It gives us both comfortable coverage. It held up well playing in the lake.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf5

customer_reviews.title: This suit is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look, style, fit , and overall look. It has been used alot since purchased, washed many times, yet still maintains a fresh look. Highly recommend for those that like the full bottom coverage for their little one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a granddaughter. The material is of great quality and the style and fit is perfect. I ordered a size 6 for my 5 year old who is tall and athletic. She won’t take it off as she likes it and says it’s comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Cute but smal! 🤗
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter wears a 7/8 even though she’s only 6. She’s tall and slender like her mom n dad that are 6’1 and slender. I bought her an 8 so it would last longer than a month. It was way too small. Buy big. It is super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected; cute and sporty
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old is super tall! I bought this for her to have for hopefully two seasons. The fit is great on her and she loves the color. The material is good.
customer_reviews.author: thejem

customer_reviews.title: Adorable suit
customer_reviews.text: I normally size up for swimwear but bought the 5/6 for my 5 yr old who is 40" and 42 lbs (currently wears a 6x), it fit perfectly and is SO cute on her. It doesn't sag after swimming like a lot of other suits.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice thick, well constructed swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit. It is very thick and well made. I like it is modest but still cute. It fits slightly big but is still wearable. I would recommend this suit.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great for my tall 11 yr old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 11 and 5'2' (95 percentile) and very slim. Modesty is important to us and this was a perfect fit for her. We live in Las Vegas area and go to the pool often during the summers and this was my daughter's favorite.
customer_reviews.author: NatalieK

customer_reviews.title: bright colors
customer_reviews.text: my daughter is 8 and it fit great. the tag on the suit says 2xl which is interesting. but my daughter loves it. she wanted a more modest suit, and i can't complain!
customer_reviews.author: BeccaBills

customer_reviews.title: Top is nice, bottoms are a little short
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes the top, but the shorts show far too much upper leg/buttcheek for her liking. She'll just wear it with another bottom since the top is actually really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute swimsuit. Fit my 10 yr old perfectly. Beautiful colors great quality
customer_reviews.author: Yanelys Lazo

customer_reviews.title: Great public swim wears
customer_reviews.text: So well made, got for grand daughter vacation. She is size 10 normal attire. Covers area’s of private nicely and great for that age of shyness and innocence.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: My daughter will only wear it at home as a result of feeling like it is baggy on top
customer_reviews.text: It was a little larger than expected, especially the top. My daughter will only wear it at home as a result of feeling like it is baggy on top.
customer_reviews.author: M. Prochaska

customer_reviews.title: Got wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Biggest size they had (5x) was too small for my 120lb 5ft 10 yr old. Nothing wrong with it, just not the right size for her. Oh well. Great quality material though
customer_reviews.author: Paula C.

customer_reviews.title: Sized right
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves that the tank top goes all the way down and she doesn't have to keep pulling it down, and the shorts are a big hit for her also. Shes 5 and I ordered a 5-6 and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Herman

product_meta.title: JerrisApparel Little Girls' Summer Two Piece Boyshort Tankini Kids Swimsuit
feature_bullets: Three colors available: Blue, Rose & Watermelon Red
Occasion: summer surfing, beach holiday, swimming & bathing
Before order, we'd like you to refer to our size chart in below description to select the suitable one. Notice: the size 7XL is with detachable pads on the top
